chunks: IN THE HON'BLE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM (Original Jurisdiction) In the matter of the Companies Act, 1956 and IN THE MATTER OF Mis. RAMANGALM TILE WORKS COMPANY LTD ( IN LIQUIDATION) Co.Pet. No : 13/2002 E-AUCTION NOTICE In pursuance of the Hon'ble High Court order dated 17.3.2025 passed in Official Liquidator's Report No. 80 online competitive bids are hereby invited for sale of below described assets through e-auction scheduled on 19.5.2025 from 14.00 hours to 17.00 hours. The entire e- auction catalogue ie. "Terms and conditions" of sale containing the schedules for giving full particulars of event of e-auction, guidelines for online registration etc are available on Rail Tel Corporation of India Ltd website: www.railtelindia.com and can be viewed by clicking on the following URL of https://olauction.enivida.com and Ministry's website at www.mca.gov.in. Inspection of the assets can be had at the premises situated at Maneed Village, Muvattupuzha taluk in Ernakulam district on 30.4.2025 between 10 a.m to 4 p.m. The Official Liquidator subject to the orders of the Hon'ble High Court of Kerala reserves the right to accept or reject the highest offer and also put the assets for resale. The EMD as above need to be paid through online mode on or before 8.5.2025. Lot Description of Properties EMD Upset Price No. Rs Rs I Landed property to the extent of 1.75 acres of land lying in Sy. No 463/1 in Maneed 7,80,000 78,39,480 village, Muvattupuzha taluk in Ernakulam district 1 The intending bidders may contact Sri.Gagan T.S., Sr.Manager, M/s.RailTel Corporation of India, Bengaluru on Mobile No: 8448288987/89 & Smt..Sujatha 8448288994/86 for doubts/clarifications, if any, on thee-auction procedure and Smt.Gigi Anand, JTA, Official ofthe office of the Official Liquidator during office hours on Mobile No: 9947442731between 9 a.m.to 5.30 p.m for details about the properties. Dated this the 9" day of April, 2025. OFFICIAL HIGH COUR O KERALA CORPORA BHAVAN rd 3 Floor, B.M.C.ROAD, THRIKKAKKARA P.0., KOCHIi -21 2
